text: The Fiji women's national football team represents Fiji in international women's football. The team is controlled by the Fiji Football Association. As of September 2018, Fiji is currently ranked 81 in the world by FIFA.https://www.fifa.com/associations/association=fij/ranking/gender=f/index.html/ == World Cup == {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;
